analysis.name: Timer-Friend
analysis.description: Time Management POC for Time Timer
achievements: Developed a Proof of Concept (POC) time management application, demonstrating proficiency in Android development using Kotlin.
Designed and implemented core application architecture, demonstrating an understanding of software design principles for Android applications.
Successfully integrated fundamental Android components to create a functional and user-friendly time management application.
Showcased the ability to develop a mobile application from scratch, addressing practical challenges present in the time management user case.
Independently created an Android application, showcasing self-direction and the ability to drive a project to a functional state.
key_features: Kotlin codebase for efficient Android development.
Utilized basic Android SDK APIs for application functionality.
Project setup and configuration for a Kotlin Android project.
Following basic principles for code file organization.
